title: Finding Zane
description: A girl with a broken heart, and an android with the power to heal it.She's been selling dreams in her family's toy shop since she could talk, but practical Meredith has never believed in magic and fairytales. Until a special delivery brings to life a fantasy and plunges her into a delicious dream of her own.When an unmarked container shows up at the store, Meredith assumes it's this year's latest craze. Instead, she finds a human-sized doll that resembles every anime lover's dream guy: spiky black hair, big blue eyes, and looks to die for.But dolls can't talk and they most certainly can't kiss like a god. Except this one does, and as Meredith falls hard for Zane, he begs her to help find the company that made him. He swears he's real, and only she can discover the truth.Meredith has to take a chance and believe in magic because someone very real is after Zane, and they'll kill everyone to get to him.AI and Anime meet Mannequin in this Young Adult Science Fiction Romance where magic and science blend together into a dangerous and taboo love story.
author: Eliza Tilton
